/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day.
